Journal.Title: Clinical neurophysiology : official journal of the International Federation of Clinical Neurophysiology

Article.ArticleTitle: Long-COVID and myalgic encephalomyelitis/chronic fatigue syndrome (ME/CFS): Potential neurophysiological biomarkers for these enigmatic entities.

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: Department of Neurorehabilitation, Hospital of Vipiteno (SABES-ASDAA), Vipiteno-Sterzing, Italy; Lehrkrankenhaus der Paracelsus Medizinischen Privatuniversität, Salzburg, Austria. Electronic address: viviana.versace@sabes.it.
Department of Clinical Neurophysiology, Aarhus University Hospital, Aarhus, Denmark.

MedlineCitation.CoiStatement: Conflict of Interest Statement None of the authors have potential conflicts of interest to be disclosed.
